memberdef.name: R_CHECK

briefdescription.para: Helper macro for checking return codes.

memberdef.name: R_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const bool result = EXP; \ if( ! result ) { \ ::Error( CONTEXT, XAOD_MESSAGE( "Failed to evaluate: %s" ), #EXP ); \ return xAOD::TReturnCode::kFailure; \ } \ } while( 0 )
